程序包 moralScore

类 club

java.lang.Object
moralScore.club
所有已实现的接口:
Serializable
public class club extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a club in the Moral Score System. A club has a name, role, semester, credit, hours, role rank, and verification status.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • club

      public club(String name_Club, String name_Role, String semester, int credit, int hours, int role_rank, boolean verified)
      Constructs a club object with the specified properties.
      参数:
      name_Club - The name of the club.
      name_Role - The name of the role.
      semester - The semester associated with the club.
      credit - The credit earned for the club.
      hours - The number of hours spent in the club.
      role_rank - The rank associated with the role.
      verified - The verification status of the club.
